text: Damatou Subdistrict () is a subdistrict and the seat of Ziyang District in Yiyang Prefecture-level City, Hunan, China. The subdistrict was reformed through the amalgamation of Dashuiping Subdistrict () and the former Damatou Subdistrict in 2005.2012年4月，湖南省民政厅 湘民行发〔2005〕35号 批复同意: 大水坪和大码头2个街道办事处合并设立大码头街道办事处（办事处机关驻大水坪）. see xzqh.org (2016-02-05) It has an area of with a population of 43,483 (as of 2010 census). the subdistrict was divided into 10 communities and one village. ==References== Category:Ziyang District Category:Township-level divisions of Hunan
title: Damatou
